TITLE: Cut your MP4 videos online
META: Easiest way to cut your MP4 videos online.
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our video editing process elegant and straightforward
The results are accurate and hence completely satisfy user needs
You can use this application from now on any operating system, like Windows/Mac/Linux/Android/iPhone.
There is no server involved and hence your video is safe
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
The application works completely on your browser without invlolving any server.Hence your data is safe

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to cut your mp4
steps: Choose your video file or Click on the drop down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive
Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Set the frames or timeline that is to be cut from the video
Click save to download your video

FAQ.question: How can I upload files from my drive/dropbox?
FAQ.answer: Click on the drop down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive. Select the Google account from where you want to link your drive. Now you can select the files that you want to upload.

FAQ.question: Can I split my video in MP4 cutter?
FAQ.answer: Yes, you can both cut and split your MP4 videos. You can drag or click on the play back bar and click on save. Your video will be saved and ready to download.

FAQ.question: Will the quality of my video decrease after cutting it?
FAQ.answer: Until and unless you change the resolution of your file, it won't affect the quality of your MP4 file. The quality of your video will remain intact, only the size or the length will be changed.

FAQ.question: Can I upload and cut any other file type?
FAQ.answer: With MP4 cutter, you can upload and cut only MP4 files. For other video types, you can use our Video cutter feature.

FAQ.question: Why is it taking so long to process my file?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to cut and process your video depend on the size, aspect ratio and the number of cuts you have performed. If your file size is bigger, it will take a bit longer than regular files.

FAQ.question: Which Windows versions does MP4 cutter support?
FAQ.answer: MP4 Cutter is completely web-based and therefore provides cross-platform support. This means that our tool supports all versions of Windows. It not only works on windows operating system, but can work on any other operating system, that supports a browser.

FAQ.question: Does it support both Android and iOS platforms?
FAQ.answer: Yes, our website works on browser, and therefore supports both iOS and Android platforms

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: All processing is done on your browser, and no files are transferred to the server. Hence your files are 100% safe.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use MP4 cutter?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: What is the difference between cut and split?
FAQ.answer:
Cutting allows you to cut your video from either end of the entire length of the video. You can shorten your video as much as you like from either the starting or the ending or both as well.
Splitting a video means dividing your video into two or more parts. After splitting your video you can make individual changes to video parts and save the video as one file.

FAQ.question: How can I cut multiple videos?
FAQ.answer: MP4 cutter allows you to cut multiple files, one after the other. When you cut one file and click on save, the video will be processed. After the video has been processes, you can see download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the file. In order to cut another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see upload MP4 option. Now you can again select your file which you want to cut.

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to cut it.
